parameters.functionCode:
// Generate phishing templates return items.map(item => { const json = item.json; const templateNum = json.template; const trackingUrl = json.trackingUrl; const firstName = json.name.split(' ')[0]; const templates = [ { subject: '‚ö†Ô∏è Password Expiry Notice - Action Required', html: `

‚ö†Ô∏è IT Security Notice

Hello ${firstName},

Your password expires in 4 hours!

Our records show your password hasn't been updated in 90 days. To prevent account lockout, please update it immediately:

Reset Password Now ‚Üí

This is an automated message from IT Security. Do not reply to this email.
Reference ID: SEC-${Math.random().toString(36).substring(2, 9).toUpperCase()}

` }, { subject: 'Document shared with you: Q4_Budget_Final.xlsx', html: `
‚òÅÔ∏è CloudDocs

Hi ${firstName},

Sarah Martinez shared a document with you:

üìä
Q4_Budget_Final.xlsx
Shared by Sarah Martinez ‚Ä¢ 1.2 MB
"Please review before tomorrow's meeting - made some important changes to projections"
Open Document

This notification was sent to ${firstName} because someone shared a CloudDocs file with you.
CloudDocs - Simple, Secure, Seamless

` }, { subject: 'Unusual Activity Detected - Verify Your Account', html: `

üîê Security Alert

‚ö†Ô∏è Suspicious activity detected on your account

Dear ${firstName},

We've detected unusual sign-in activity on your account:

New Device Login Attempt
Location: Moscow, Russia
Device: Windows PC (Chrome)
Time: ${new Date().toLocaleString()}
IP: 185.220.xxx.xxx

If this wasn't you, secure your account immediately:

Secure Account Now
If you recognized this activity, you can safely ignore this email. We take your security seriously and will continue monitoring for suspicious activity.
` } ]; const selectedTemplate = templates[templateNum - 1]; return { json: { ...json, subject: selectedTemplate.subject, html: selectedTemplate.html } }; });

parameters.responseBody:
# Instant Phishing Training

You've clicked on a simulated phishing link!

### Lessons Learned:
- Always verify the sender's email address.
- Hover over links to check the URL before clicking.
- Look for urgent language or unexpected requests.

Visit our security portal for full training materials.

*This event is logged anonymously for aggregate metrics only.*

parameters.content:
## Getting started
**Create credentials** Create credentials for google sheet (read write), google drive (read), and email.

**Change from email** in the "send phishing test, and "Email Report" nodes..

**Update the Instant Training** page as well, that is sent to people who click ont he email.

**Update the Phishing Template** as well. Good ideas is to use your own company's branding, and send it from an email with a similar url as your company's URL, to make it as sophisticated as possible. Some phishing scams also impersonate, that is pretend to send it from another employee.

**Update the Phishing Template** as well. Good ideas is to use your own company's branding, and send it from an email with a similar url as your company's URL, to make it as sophisticated as possible. Some phishing scams also impersonate, that is pretend to send it from another employee.

**Update the webhook link** either in your n8n yaml file or in your .env file, change the WEBHOOK_URL=, and restart the container if using docker.
